Payment information

Important

Please note that if you enter a billing zip code other than the one on file with the credit card’s issuing bank, or an incorrect CVC code, Metro Transit will deny your transaction for security purposes. Additionally, rejected debit card transactions may cause the funds to be held by your bank for up to 5 business days before being released back to the card.
